Description: Eight hermits; cutting from "Leben der Altväter", printed by Peter Berger, Augsburg. 1488 Woodcut with hand-colouring
Bibliographic references: Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (D.8)

Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Representation of: St Paul the Hermit
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Theodor Oswald Weigel (sale Leipzig 27.v.1872/198)
